summary: **Fallout: New Vegas** is a 2010 action role-playing game set in the Mojave Desert after a nuclear war. You play as a courier who gets shot and wakes up to find a big conflict between different groups fighting for control. The game lets you explore a big, open world and fight using various weapons. It was made by Obsidian Entertainment and published by Bethesda Softworks for PC, PlayStation 3, and Xbox 360. While it had some glitches, the game was a commercial success and is now considered one of the best video games ever made.
title: Fallout New Vegas
